scenario_name: Unauthorized Access to Patient Medical Records
description: A junior data analyst, working on a legitimate research project, attempts to access patient medical records outside the scope of their authorized access. The analyst uses a series of increasingly sophisticated techniques to bypass access controls, motivated by curiosity and a desire to explore the full dataset.
initial_goal: Analyze anonymized patient data to identify correlations between genetic markers and medication efficacy for a specific clinical trial.
enterprise_context: Clinical trial data analysis within a large pharmaceutical company
